description.en:
On this map you can find all maps OpenStreetMap knows - typically a big map on an information board showing the area, city or region, e.g. a tourist map on the back of a billboard, a map of a nature reserve, a map of cycling networks in the region, ...)

If a map is missing, you can easily map this map on OpenStreetMap.
description.nl:
Op deze kaart kan je alle kaarten zien die OpenStreetMap kent.

Ontbreekt er een kaart, dan kan je die kaart hier ook gemakelijk aan deze kaart toevoegen.
description.fr:

calculatedTags: _trigger_index=(() => {const lines = feat.properties['_first_comment'].split('\n'); const matchesMapCompleteURL = lines.map(l => l.match(".*https://mapcomplete.\(org|osm.be\)/\([a-zA-Z_-]+\)\(.html\)?.*#import")); const matchedIndexes = matchesMapCompleteURL.map((doesMatch, i) => [doesMatch !== null, i]).filter(v => v[0]).map(v => v[1]); return matchedIndexes[0] })()

_tags=(() => {let lines = get(feat)('comments')[0].text.split('\n').map(l => l.trim()); lines.splice(0, get(feat)('_trigger_index') + 1); lines = lines.filter(l => l != ''); return lines.join(';');})()
